repository.corpname: Washington State University Libraries, Manuscripts, Archives and Special Collections

origination.corpname: Associated Students of Washington State University

did.unittitle: Preliminary Guide to the ASWSU Bills, etc.
did.abstract: Files from the ASWSU ranging from about 1999-2001. Files include bills, agendas, resolutions, and minutes.

bioghist.p: The Associated Students of Washington State University serves as the goverment for the general student body. In 1915 the Associated Students of the State College of Washington was founded. When the college changed its name in 1959 to Washington State University, the association changed its name to the Associated Students of Washington State University (ASWSU). The ASWSU functions as the central office for student interests and concerns.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of files from the ASWSU from 1999-2001. Files include bills, agendas, resolutions, and minutes.

arrangement.p: This is an unprocessed collection. Any arrangement reflects either a pre-existing order from the records' creators or previous custodians, or preliminary sorting performed by staff.
Items are separated clearly with labeled tabs. Also includes booklets related to bills and meeting minutes of the ASWSU.

accessrestrict.p: This collection is open and available for research use.

prefercite.p: Preliminary Guide to the ASWSU Bills, etc., 1999-2001 (UA2001-12)
Manuscripts, Archives, and Special Collections, Washington State University Libraries, Pullman, WA.

acqinfo.p: This material was transferred to WSU Libraries' MASC by Janet Ashcraft on August 14, 2001 and retained as UA2001-12.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
